pages.text: A few days ago, I was invited to the feast held in Hakugyokurou.$(br2)The former Lord of Konpaku family had lived in seclusion. A young swordswoman replaced him as the princess's guard.$(br2)Seeing the two Blades that we smithed with our lives, my tears came out.

Before I left, I decided to enjoy the view of the Hakugyokurou.$(br2)When I wandered in the cloister, I witnessed a black shadow holding two Blades, which were so familiar to me.$(br2)Its face... was the young swordswoman's.$(br2)When she unsheathed the two Blades, a strong bewitched gust blew to me... Then she was gone.

Why was the tachi so similar to the Tachi of Spirit Sakura...$(br2)No. It was not that tachi.$(br2)I could not feel the Spirit Sakura power from it. Its power came from the Hell.$(br2)Gokukaiken! Why is it?
